message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $20,000. I believe it will greatly benefit you, and this is a very competitive price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is quite high. I can meet you halfway at $17,500. This is my best offer.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly come to an agreement at $15,000?
